thread.title: Viral of the Day: Lionel Richie Says “Hello” to Adele
thread.title_full: Viral of the Day: Lionel Richie Says “Hello” to Adele - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Viral of the Day: Lionel Richie Says “Hello” to Adele
text: Adele’s first music video in years dropped last Friday. “Hello” is the leading single off the album “25,” which will be out on November 20 and will be Adele’s third studio release so far. The official music video now sits at almost 70 million views on YouTube, and it’s already spanned very popular memes. A mashup with Lionel Richie’s 1983 hit of the same name was to be expected. What comes as a surprise, though, is the fact that Richie himself would get in on the fun. T... »
